target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def calculate_expected_rolls(days):
    E_per_day = Rational(6, 5)  # From previous calculations
    return days * E_per_day
target.description: Calculate the expected number of die rolls based on defined probabilities and rules.
target.name: calculate_expected_rolls

target.description: Calculate the number of combinations of choosing k items from n items.
target.name: calculate_combinations

target.description: Calculate the number of permutations of n items taken k at a time.
target.name: calculate_permutations
